Analysis relative day

Source: R/dates.R
ady.Rd

Derives the relative day compared to the treatment start date.

Usage

ady(.self, date)

Arguments

.self

data.frame Input data set

date

character Name of date variable to use

Value

.self with added analysis relative day

Mighty

Type

derivation

Depends

  • .self.{date}

  • .self.TRTSDT

Outputs

  • {date}Y

Examples

pharmaverseadam::adae |>
  dplyr::select(USUBJID, TRTSDT, ASTDT) |>
  ady("ASTDT")
#> # A tibble: 1,191 × 4
#>    USUBJID     TRTSDT     ASTDT      ASTDY
#>    <chr>       <date>     <date>     <dbl>
#>  1 01-701-1015 2014-01-02 2014-01-03     2
#>  2 01-701-1015 2014-01-02 2014-01-03     2
#>  3 01-701-1015 2014-01-02 2014-01-09     8
#>  4 01-701-1023 2012-08-05 2012-08-07     3
#>  5 01-701-1023 2012-08-05 2012-08-07     3
#>  6 01-701-1023 2012-08-05 2012-08-07     3
#>  7 01-701-1023 2012-08-05 2012-08-26    22
#>  8 01-701-1028 2013-07-19 2013-07-21     3
#>  9 01-701-1028 2013-07-19 2013-08-08    21
#> 10 01-701-1034 2014-07-01 2014-08-27    58
#> # ℹ 1,181 more rows
